comment: Remember back when nobody used to be able to read and write except the clergy? And that obviously only drew the elite of European men? What a coincidence that this meant being bound to celibacy and not allowed to reproduce, wouldn't you say?
amr:
# ::snt Remember back when nobody used to be able to read and write except the clergy? And that obviously only drew the elite of European men? What a coincidence that this meant being bound to celibacy and not allowed to reproduce, wouldn't you say?
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (r / remember-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (t / time
                  :time-of (p / possible-01
                        :ARG1 (a / and
                              :op1 (r2 / read-01
                                    :ARG0 (n / nobody
                                          :ARG2-of (e / except-01
                                                :ARG1 (c / clergy))))
                              :op2 (w / write-01
                                    :ARG0 n))
                        :time (u / use-03)))
            :snt2 (a2 / and
                  :op2 (d / draw-02
                        :ARG0 p
                        :ARG1 (e2 / elite
                              :mod (m2 / man
                                    :mod (c2 / continent
                                          :name (n2 / name
                                                :op1 "Europe"))))
                        :mod (o / only)
                        :ARG1-of (o2 / obvious-01)))
            :snt3 (c3 / coincidence
                  :domain (m3 / mean-01
                        :ARG1 (t2 / this)
                        :ARG2 (a3 / and
                              :op1 (b / bind-01
                                    :ARG1 (c4 / celibacy)
                                    :ARG2 n)
                              :op2 (a4 / allow-01
                                    :polarity -
                                    :ARG1 (r3 / reproduce-01
                                          :ARG0 n))))
                  :ARG1-of (r4 / request-confirmation-91))))

comment: Well that was in the west whilst in the east with the Orthodox church you had everyone being theologians and even the Priest could have kids . That saiddd maybe that is why the Latin Rite had them destroyed .

                  :ARG2 (w / west))
            :ARG2 (b2 / be-located-at-91
                  :ARG1 (h / have-03
                        :ARG0 (y / you)
                        :ARG1 (a / and
                              :op1 (t2 / theologian
                                    :domain (e / everyone))
                              :op2 (p / possible-01

                                                :mod (e2 / even))
                                          :ARG1 (k / kid)))))
                  :ARG2 (e3 / east
                        :location-of (h3 / have-03
                              :ARG0 (o / organization
                                    :name (n / name
                                          :op1 "Orthodox"
                                          :op2 "Church"))))))
      :snt2 p

comment: Hi there, xenophobic and homophobic slurs are offensive and hurtful and should not be used. Please refrain from these types of comments

      :snt1 (s / say-01
            :ARG1 (h / hi)
            :ARG2 (t / there))
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (o / offend-01
                  :ARG0 (s2 / slur
                        :mod (a2 / and

            :op2 (h3 / hurt-01
                  :ARG0 s2)
            :op3 (r / recommend-01

      :snt3 (r2 / refrain-01

            :polite +
            :ARG0 (y / you)

                        :mod (t3 / this)))))
